metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Bot Management uses global threat intelligence and machine learning to protect Internet properties from credential stuffing, content scraping, and more.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Private Access Tokens: a future with greater privacy and fewer CAPTCHAs

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Bot Management
relatedBlades.subtitle: Stop bad bots while moving beyond CAPTCHAs
relatedBlades.copy:
Undetected malicious bots can damage your brand, steal sensitive information, take over accounts, and negatively impact your revenue.

Now you can manage good and bad bots in real-time with speed and accuracy by harnessing the data from the millions of Internet properties on Cloudflare.

All with quick and easy deployment or as part of our SOC-as-a-service offering.

relatedBlades.title: Manage bots with speed and accuracy by applying several detection methods

features.title: Behavioral Analysis
features.description: Cloudflare analyzes behavior and detects anomalies in your Internet property's specific traffic, scoring every request by how different it is from the baseline.

features.title: Machine Learning
features.description: Cloudflare's Machine Learning trains on a curated subset of hundreds of billions of requests per day to create a reliable bot score for every request.

features.title: Fingerprinting
features.description: Cloudflare uses fingerprinting from millions of Internet properties to accurately classify bots. They do not generate or store device fingerprints, eliminating the risk of user privacy being compromised.

features.title: Credential Stuffing
features.description: Exposes your application to account takeovers and breaches of sensitive customer data

features.title: Content Scraping
features.description: Hurts your site's SEO ranking and increases margin pressures from competitors

features.title: Content Spam
features.description: Pollutes your data and creates a bad customer experience with malicious content

features.title: Inventory Hoarding
features.description: Damages your brand and jeopardizes your relationship with suppliers

features.title: Credit Card Stuffing
features.description: Puts your ability to accept payments at risk

features.title: Application DDoS
features.description: Slows sites for visitors while wasting bandwidth and compute resources

relatedBlades.title: A Future without CAPTCHAs
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is leading the world to a future without CAPTCHAs. We have developed effective new ways to challenge bots without the frustrations of solving CAPTCHAs.  

We uniquely call on Private Access Tokens, a new open source standard for an invisible, privacy-first way for users to prove they are real using Apple devices – without CAPTCHAs or PII collection.

relatedBlades.quote: "The great thing about Cloudflare Bot Management solutions is I don't need to spend time fine-tuning. The machine learning algorithms just work because Cloudflare has such great data. Our lives are 1000 times easier while still ensuring our sites are both safe and fast for our customers."

relatedBlades.title: Bot Management is part of SOC-as-a-service
Simple Deployment
relatedBlades.copy: Deploy a fast and accurate bot management solution without complex configuration or maintenance. Cloudflare Bot Management will automatically recommend rules to manage bots out-of-the-box. No instrumentation with third-party JavaScript required.

relatedBlades.title: Lowest Latency
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare Bot Management delivers ultra low-latency bot defenses, with median latency of 0.3 milliseconds or less.  Our bot management performance  keeps applications in the fast lane.

relatedBlades.title: Rich Analytics and Logs
relatedBlades.copy: Improve your security posture by understanding, analyzing, and learning from automated traffic in the dashboard with [Bot Analytics](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-bot-analytics/). Create your own dashboards that correlate bot management traffic logs with your other data sources by using third-party tools such as SIEMs or business intelligence applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Analytics granular visibility cache spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Analytics granular visibility cache spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Control and Configurability
relatedBlades.copy: Tune bot management rules to fit your specific needs by scoping them based on path or URI pattern, request method, score sensitivities, and mitigation methods, such as log, challenge, or block. Use a visual rule builder or write your own pattern-matching rules.

features.title: Threat Intelligence At-Scale
features.description: Accurately identify bots by applying behavioral analysis, machine learning and fingerprinting to a diverse and vast volume of globally distributed data.

features.title: Integrated Security and Performance
features.description: Cloudflare's Bot Management solution seamlessly integrates with its WAF, DDoS and CDN products, enhancing security, user experience, and performance.

features.title: Complete Without Complexity
features.description: Instant deployment and protection against a full range of bot attacks without Javascript injection and mobile SDK.

features.title: Automatic Allowlists
features.description: Allows good bots, such as those belonging to search engines, to keep reaching your site while preventing malicious traffic.

features.title: Mobile App and API Protection
features.description: Protects your mobile applications from impersonation and emulation attacks without using mobile SDK. The solution also protects APIs that are accessed via web browsers.

features.title: Configuration Flexibility
features.description: Granular rules, user-defined mitigations and unique actions beyond the industry standard like render a mock-login or alternative pricing page to thwart bots.

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare Bot Management gives us peace of mind as we scale our business. Our team can focus on creating value for our clients instead of dealing with bots! We now have a better experience for our clients with reduced spam, account takeovers, and malicious activity."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Using machine learning across millions of websites, Cloudflare was able to immediately identify unauthorized bots that were abusing our website. Their mitigation strategies block bots without impacting real users - our false-positive rate is now less than 0.01%."

relatedBlades.title: Forrester named Cloudflare a "Strong Performer" in bot management
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare was named a 'Strong Performer' in the 2022 Forrester Wave™ report for bot management. In particular, Cloudflare received the highest possible scores in five evaluation criteria:

- Product Vision
- Threat Research
- Accessible UI and Documentation
- Number of Customers
- Innovation Roadmap

imageAssetFile.altText: Forrester Wave 2022 for bot management image
imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Wave 2022 for bot management image

relatedBlades.title: World-class application security from Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy: The Cloudflare web application firewall (WAF) is the cornerstone of our advanced application security portfolio that keeps applications and APIs secure and productive, thwarts DDoS attacks, keeps bots at bay, detects anomalies and malicious payloads, all while monitoring for browser supply chain attacks.

image.description: Security features of Cloudflare Bot Management

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
